messages.title: Alan Whitehead: Our Strong Voice for Southampton
messages.content: It's been my privilege to serve our city for many years as a councillor, council leader and Member of Parliament. In that time I have always tried to do right by all of my constituents, no matter who they are or where they are from.

issues.brexitEurope: I have made it very clear that I will fight to protect the rights and futures of EU citizens living in the UK and if re-elected on Thursday 8th of June will speak out to get the best deal for Southampton and all its residents in the upcoming Brexit negotiations.
issues.immigration: One worrying aspect of how the Government has dealt with Brexit so far is its stance on EU citizens already living in the UK.

politicalExperience.role: Councillor, Council Leader, Member of Parliament
